title: Name me your worst experience that is worse than an idiot going AFK
body:
For me, it's:

_In champion selection, and was going to grab Ryze top, until some guy took him first_

Me: Dude, I want Ryze man, dont u have any other mid lane champs?
Douche: I'm going top Ryze, stfu
Me: Wtf, dude I called it!
Douche: Oh chill, ur juz gonna feed.
Me: ...ok fine, carry us then

_left to pick Nautilus jungle_

_Start of game_

{{champion:13}} (All-chat): Eyyy guys, Im new to Ryze, so plz no hate :p
{{champion:111}} : Wtf?? And u autolock without knowing anything??
{{champion:13}} : Stfu, I juz bought this amazing legendary Pitbull Ryze skin yoo (i made it up durr, it's 1820rp legendary skin btw :p)
{{champion:111}} : So you bought a freaking expensive skin for a champ that you dont even know how to play?
{{champion:13}} : Yea, so?
{{champion:111}} : And u even dare to autolock top lane away from me, when mid is open for you.
{{champion:13}} : top's better, I can bully lots :3 
{{champion:111}} : My god, how spoiled are you....?
{{champion:13}} : shut up, u want me to afk?
{{champion:111}} : .....my good lord. Juz play safe, since ur new with him

_game ended with a defeat, with Ryze score of 1/14 & team kills of 11 vs 35_

{{champion:13}} : Omg report this team, all bunch of noobs.
{{champion:111}} : http://i1.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/008/301/christian_bale_american_psycho_patrick_bateman_axe_10989289_RE_PwnzElite_has_declared_war_on_Grammar_Nazis-s400x300-173837.jpg

replies.body: For me, the worst part of League is usually supporting for Vayne. Most Vaynes I see around are really, really toxic and make my game miserable.

I haven't had too much toxic problems since the introduction of Teambuilder, but I do remember my blind pick and ranked days.

I stopped playing for a month because of Vaynes like that, and toxicity like that is the main reason I don't enter ranked now.

On the topic of supporting for Vayne

{{champion:89}} {{champion:67}}  Deadly bot lane combo (to my experience)

> [{quoted}](name=freeformline,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=9gceGENd,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-03T04:58:29.882+0000)
>
> For me, the worst part of League is usually supporting for Vayne. Most Vaynes I see around are really, really toxic and make my game miserable.

but its worth the freelo
i remember when that was ezreal

{{champion:17}} vs {{champion:69}}  Top
{{champion:3}} vs {{champion:157}} Mid

{{champion:3}} : Teemo you wanna swap lanes? You can take yasou so much easier with your blind
{{champion:17}} : fk u i called top
{{champion:3}} : I can't take his harass and you're already 0/3, I can destroy her and you can destroy yasou, swap?
{{champion:17}} : fk u nub i called top qq more
{{champion:3}} : :|
Being extremely fed and knowing in 30 minutes you're going to lose the game anyway, because it's a team game.
Experiences that are worse than someone going afk? I can name a lot of those, cancer, for instance.
I'm gonna be the ass here and say that cancer technically isn't an experience.

I guess I was referring to the colloquial usage, in that mentioning cancer is regularly interpreted as the status of having cancer, which is an experience. You're correct though, if interpreted as a noun, cancer is not an experience.
Glad you understood what I meant XD
An idiot not going afk so he can flame everyone and feed the enemy team.

Lee Sin sitting at fountain as the enemy is taking bot tower
{{champion:64}} "don't let them take bot wtf are you guys doing" pings tower an innumerable amount of times
They take bot tower, he got enough gold for his item so he jumped in 1v3 and died and we lost

Lee Sin sitting at fountain as the enemy is taking bot tower
{{champion:64}} "don't let them take bot wtf are you guys doing" pings tower an innumerable amount of times
They take bot tower, he got enough gold for his item so he jumped in 1v3 and died and we lost
Sion support.. hiding in bush entire laning phase. Ends up feeding ffs.
